Sheldon Whitehouse said Paul Ryan 's plan, which slashes taxes on capital gains, would create an even larger gap between rich and poor. The Paul Ryan plan essentially relives the richest Americans from any responsibility to pay for the support of their country, he said.`` Our country should not be a country where the super rich get to play by different rules than people who are working their way up to their own American dream.'' to visit the US to spend time with Angelina Jolie , Brad Pitt and the rest of the family. It is thought that if all goes well, Leah could be adopted by the end of this year. Angelina Jolie 's lawyers are in the process of getting an authorisation so Leah can spend some time with her in America. That's standard procedure, basically they need to make sure Leah will adapt well, a source close to one of the charities involved told British newspaper The Daily Mirror. It is believed Angelina Jolie is keen for everything to be done officially, so has been in close contact with adoption agencies

of Republicans who like Mitch Daniels ' broad experience and fiscal credentials. Mitch Daniels has said he won't make a decision about running for president until after this year's legislative season ends in April. If( Mitch Daniels ) runs, I think it's hard for Mike Pence , because all the financial base in Indiana would likely go to Mitch Daniels , Charlie Black said. But Mike Pence also can't afford to wait to decide because he has a long way to go in building a fundraising network and a campaign team, and becoming better-known.

The centre-left Labour party, which is expected to join a ruling coalition with Fine Gael, wants to extend the terms of the bailout by a year to 2016 and to achieve fair and realistic terms for the Irish people . , well-known egyptologist Zahi Hawass , on Thursday played down accounts of the break-in at the Museum and warned against`` rumours.'' In a posting on his blog, Zahi Hawass said the incident at the museum resulted in 70 broken objects, all of which can be restored. `` I want people to know that after nine days of protests, the monuments are safe,'' Zahi Hawass said.`` If anything happens, I will announce it.'' the ideological mold of Sarah Palin or Michele Bachman but without the` polarizing' temperament. For those who are in search of such a candidate, Mike Pence is their man; not Mitch Daniels . Mike Pence often describes himself as a Christian, a Conservative and a Republican, in that order . It was his social values and conservatism that imbued him with the intransigence to vote against No Child Left Behind, Medicare prescription drugs, TARP, and the Obama tax/unemployment deal.
